sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: Efficacy And Safety Of Pregabalin For Pain Following Total Knee Replacement
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-Blind Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study Of The Efficacy And Safety Of Pregabalin In The Treatment Of Subjects With Post-Operative Pain Following Total Knee Arthroplasty (TKA)
summary: Pregabalin added to the standard of care with dosing starting preoperatively and continuing for up to 6 weeks post surgery will decrease the intensity of post-operative pain following total knee replacement.

primaryOutcome.measure: Subject Reported Worst Pain Score in Daily Diaries Using the Worst Pain Item of the Modified Brief Pain Inventory - Short Form (m-BPI-sf)
